comments.name: Olivia Kaye
comments.comment: Consider including Mark's professional title or role to establish credibility and provide context for his feedback.

comments.name: Ethan Blake
comments.comment: You could specify what contributed to the 4.5-star rating to make the feedback more informative and actionable.

comments.name: Ava Peterson
comments.comment: Adding details about how verification is performed could increase trust and transparency.

comments.name: Liam Scott
comments.comment: There seems to be a typo in 'Los Angela's'. It should be corrected to 'Los Angeles'.

comments.name: Sophia Bennett
comments.comment: Consider formatting the timeline as '4 days ago' for consistency with standard date formats.

comments.name: Noah Clarke
comments.pattern: Ana Studios was very logical and creative at the same time
comments.comment: You might want to include specific examples of how Ana Studios demonstrated both logic and creativity to make this statement more compelling.

comments.name: Mia Foster
comments.pattern: excellent feedback on DePalma Studios’ designs
comments.comment: Clarify how the feedback was collected—was it through surveys, interviews, or another method?

comments.name: Jackson Hayes
comments.comment: Consider elaborating on what specific design changes improved the website's look and feel (e.g., UI updates, color scheme, or layout changes).

comments.name: Isabella Cruz
comments.pattern: The team was very communicative and collaborative
comments.comment: You could enhance this by providing a brief example of how the team’s communication and collaboration stood out.

comments.name: Lucas Reed
comments.comment: The sentence seems incomplete here. Ensure it’s finished to maintain clarity and professionalism.
